section.title: Description
section.p: This class includes data elements related to patient's eligibility and other administrative information that is evaluated at the time of admission to the Home Based Primary Care (HBPC) Program.

stentry.p: The patient's eligibility at time of evaluation for HBPC program. Possible Values Include: Service Connected 50% or More; Aid &amp; Attendance or Housebound; Service Connected Less Than 50%; Non-Service Connected, Receiving VA Pension; Other Non-Service Connected etc..
Living arrangement of a patient for HBPC Program. Possible Values Include: Alone; With Spouse; With Relatives; With Non-Relatives; Group Quarters, Not Health Related; Not Determined etc.
Marital Status of the patient at time of admission to the HBPC Program.
Patient's Health Assessment at time of admission to HBPC Program.
Type of agency providing last care to patient
